system.requirements:
Tier 2; Weapon Skill 40, Sure Strike
Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Finesse, Slaanesh
system.effect: When making a Called Shot melee attack, the character reduces the penalty by 10 (-20 to -10, or to +0 if combined with Sure Strike)

description.value: When making a Called Shot melee attack, the character reduces the penalty by 10 (-20 to -10, or to +0 if combined with Sure Strike)
